description: Dan Saxon made a big splash with his first scenes on Lucas Entertainment. He’s a really good-looking guy; it’s been pointed out more than once that he has the surfer look (and attitude) down solid, especially with his long hair, fresh face, and tanned muscular body. Ever since he hooked up and flip-fucked with the King of All Muscle Daddies, Tomas Brand, Dan Saxon has had a taste for daddies and has been fucking around with guys older than him. Adam Killian is a guy Dan has had his eye on for awhile, and Adam was more than happy to strip down and fuck raw with him!
title: Adam Killian And Dan Saxon Bareback
